Marguerite van Eeden (amụrụ n'ubochí isii n'ọnwa Juun) bụ onye na-eme ihe nkiri na onye na-ese foto na South Africa. A maara ya nkè ọma màkà ọrụ ihe nkiri ya n'asụsụ Afrikaans na Vaselinetjie na Vergeet My Nie
N'ịbụ onye si Cape, van Eeden tolitere na Botswana
Ọ gàrà ụlọ akwụkwọ óbíbí na La Rochelle Girls' High School na Paarl, na-abanye afọ 2015. Ọ gụrụ ma agụmakwụkwọ na Mahadum Stellenbosch
Mgbè ọ dị afọ iri na ise, Van Eeden bịanyere aka na MPM Acting Agency
O bu ụzọ pụta na ihe nkiri na mgbasa ozi Coca-Cola ma mee ihe nkiri telivishọn izizi ya na ọrụ ọbịa n'afọ 2016 nke usoro mpụ Die Byl

N'ime afọ izizi ya na mahadum na Stellenbosch, a tụbara Van Eeden n'ọrụ isi nke ihe nkiri ihe nkiri nkè afọ 2017 Vaselinetjie, nke e mere ka akwụkwọ akụkọ 2004 nke otu aha ahụ site n'aka onye edemede Namibia Anoeschka von Meck. N'otu afọ ahụ, ọ malitere igwu Anita na usoro Sara se Geheim, onye ọ ga-egwuri egwu ugboro ugboro maka oge abụọ, na ụdị onye na-eto eto nke Milan Murray na usoro Waterfront.
Site n'afọ 2018 ruo afọ 2020, Van Eeden pụtara na ógè atọ nkè Fynskrif dị ka Alex Kruger

Van Eeden pụtara dị ka Mardaleen Coetzer n'afọ 2020 Afrikaans romcom Vergeet my nie, nke mere ka o nweta ihe nrite na màkà Best Actress na Silver Screen Film Festival (Silwerskermfees). N'afọ 2021, ọ sonyeere ndị na-eme ihe nkiri nke kykNET Afgrond dị ka Hannelie Fourie
N'ọnwa Eprel afọ 2018, Van Eeden kwere onye egwu Danie du Toit nkè otu égwu Afrikaans bụ Spoegwolf nkwa ọlụlụ.
